resources.string: Note not saved because some fields are empty.
Secondary line text Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, nec no nominavi scaevola. Per et sint sapientem, nobis perpetua salutandi mei te.

string.name: cat_card_swipe_dismiss
string.description: the title of a screen where you can swipe to dismiss a card [CHAR LIMIT=20]

string.name: cat_card_dismissed
string.description: a transient text that appears on screen when a card is dismissed [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: cat_card_undo
string.description: A label in a button to dismiss the last action [CHAR LIMIT=15]

resources.string:
Help Text : 	
1) First Capture any image which contains text. 	
2) This App extract text from image. 	
3) Now you can share, edit, copy, listen, and download pdf file of captured text
